info.headline: Flood Warning issued April 8 at 11:26AM CDT until April 18 at 3:15AM CDT by NWS Paducah KY
info.description:
...The Flood Warning is extended for the following rivers in Kentucky...Indiana...
Ohio River at Evansville affecting Vanderburgh, Posey, Warrick, Henderson and Daviess Counties.
...The Flood Warning continues for the following rivers in Kentucky...Indiana...Illinois...
Ohio River at Owensboro affecting Spencer and Daviess Counties.
Ohio River at Golconda affecting Crittenden, Livingston, Pope and Hardin Counties.
Ohio River near Henderson affecting Henderson, Vanderburgh and Posey Counties.
Ohio River at J.T. Myers Dam affecting Union and Posey Counties.
Ohio River at Shawneetown affecting Crittenden, Gallatin, Union and Hardin Counties.
Ohio River at Mount Vernon affecting Henderson, Union, Vanderburgh and Posey Counties.
Ohio River at Newburgh Dam affecting Vanderburgh, Warrick, Henderson, Spencer and Daviess Counties.
.After heavy rainfall last week and over the weekend, the Ohio River continues to rise. Moderate to Major flooding is expected. Most locations from Owensboro to Golconda will crest from later this week into early next week.
* WHAT...Minor flooding is occurring and moderate flooding is forecast.
* WHERE...Ohio River at Evansville.
* WHEN...Until Friday, April 18.
* ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 11:00 AM CDT Tuesday the stage was 45.3 feet. - Forecast...The river will rise to 48.0 feet Saturday morning. It will then fall early Saturday afternoon. It will rise to 48.0 feet Sunday morning. It will then fall below flood stage Thursday, April 17. - Flood stage is 42.0 feet. - Flood History...This crest compares to a previous crest of 48.3 feet on 03/11/1945.
info.instruction:
Motorists should not attempt to drive around barricades or drive cars through flooded areas.
Turn around, don't drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles.
Caution is urged when walking near riverbanks.
Be especially cautious at night when it is harder to recognize the dangers of flooding.
Additional information is available at www.weather.gov.

parameter.value: FLOOD WARNING NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL FRIDAY, APRIL 18

area.areaDesc: Posey, IN; Vanderburgh, IN; Warrick, IN; Daviess, KY; Henderson, KY
